short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Encrypt/decrypt text with a key into AES, SHA, MD5, Binary, Base64 and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want to encrypt or decrypt text using AES, MD5, SHA-256, DES? This is the perfect extension for that!
Just select the encryption type, input your key and the text, and select encrypt or decrypt!
If you wish to just translate to binary or base64, then you're covered by this extension!

Made using CryptoJS.

Please take note of the disclaimer in the extensions popup.
